ml:Event.ml:title: Please join us on November 9th for the next MarkLogic users group meeting in Denver (DenMARK)!

p.ml:teaser: The intuitive approach of the Resource-oriented API builds squarely on the HTTP protocol and its standard POST, GET, UPDATE and DELETE methods. This presentation will be code-focused and cover the basics of building such an API on MarkLogic Server, including the configuration of the url-rewriter and writing tests

ml:details.ml:location: Auraria Campus, Tivoli Bldg (900 Walnut St. Denver CO. 80204) Rm 320 Section B - Baerresen Ballroom
ml:details.ml:topic: Building a Resource-oriented API on MarkLogic Server
ml:details.ml:presenter: Reed Esau, Platform Architect, Catalyst Repository Systems
